fullplot: A chronicle of the life of Yasui Santetsu, a 17th century master of go who turned his attention to astronomy and created a new calendar for Japan.
plot: A chronicle of the life of Yasui Santetsu, a 17th century master of go who turned his attention to astronomy and created a new calendar for Japan.
title: Tenchi: The Samurai Astronomer
writers: Tow Ubukata (based on the novel by)
